titleStmt.title: SII 7.944: original edition by K.V. Subrahmanya Aiyer
No. 944. (A.R. No. 315 of 1902). ON THE EAST WALL OF THE SABHA IN THE SAME TEMPLE.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
pūmaṉṉu patumam pūtta veḻulakun tāmuṉcey tavattāl parutivaḻit toṉṟi mutalāka Ampoṉ malarkkoṭi cempiyankiḻānaṭi Orumaruṅ kuṭaṉamarn tiruppac cempoṉ vīrasiṁhāsaṉattup puvaṉamuḻutuṭaiyāḷoṭum vīṟṟiruntaruḷiya kovirājake
muṭivākavuḷḷa śrīmeykkīrttiyuṭaiya tribhuvaṉaccakkaravattikaḷ śrīkulottuṅkacoḻatevarkku 10 5vatu Iṣapanāyaṟṟup patināṟān tiyetiyāṉa nāyaṟṟukkiḻamai nāḷ rājarājavaḷanāṭṭut tirumuṉaippāṭit tiruveṇṇainallūrnāṭṭup brahmateya
nallūr Uṭaiyār Āṭkoṇṭatevar koyilil māṭāpattiyañ ceyta Uṭaiyār Akamuṭaiyāḷ poṉnāṇṭāḷen nilavilaiyāvaṇañ ceytukuṭutta paricāvatu Ivvuṭaiyār Āṭkoṇṭatevar koyilile kaṭamaipaṭṭu nilainillāte Oṭippoṉa
puṇaippaṭṭa kaviṉit tevarkaḷtevapaṭṭaṉum pārkuḷattut tillaimuvāyiranampiyum Ivviruvaraiyu meṉakku mutukaṇṇākak koṇṭu Ittevar tittakkuḷamāṉa tevaṉārkeṇiyiṉ kiḻkaraiyil Eḻun=taruḷiyiruntu pūcai koṇṭaruḷukiṟa Āḷu
mutupaṭikkun tirukkaikoṭṭippuṟattukkumākavum nāṉ viṟṟukkuṭutta nilamāvatu Ivvūr śrīvāṉavaṉvatikku meṟku mummuṭicoḻavāykkālukku vaṭakku mutaṟ kaṇṇāṟṟup peruvaḻikku meṟkuk kaḷḷiviḷākameṉṟu peruṭaiya
laimuvāyiranampi Uḷḷiṭṭārpakkal Ivvuṭaiyār vilaikoṇṭuṭaiya � + 1/20 + � m Itan teṟku perumpāṇṭur kaṟṟuṟaisahasran Uḷḷiṭṭārpakkal vilaikoṇṭuṭaiya 3/80 + 1/20 + �m Ivvatikkuk kiḻakku Ivvāykkā
lukku vaṭakku mutaṟ kaṇṇāṟṟu nālāñ caturattu Ittevar tevatānam poṉmeyn=tacoḻanallūr Ellaikku kiḻakku ṉellivāykkālukku teṟku kavini kaṟṟuṟai ṭuṭaiya 2m Āka 3 la 3/80 + 1/20 Inni
lam muṉṟumā mukkāṇiyiṉāl Oṉṟe Araimā varaikkāṇik kiḻaraiyum viṟṟukkuṭuttuk koḷvatāṉa Emmi licainta vilaipporuḷ Aṉṟāṭu naṟ ya kiḻic celavaṟak koṇṭu Āṭkoṇ
ṭatevar śrīpaṇṭārattile Ikkaṭamaik kuṭalāka Oṭukkiṉeṉ Ittevarkaḷtevapaṭṭaṉaiyum Ittillaimuvāyiranampiyaiyum mutukaṇṇākavu lam Oṉṟe Araimā varaikkāṇik
kiḻaraikkuñ cilliṟai peruvari Eccoṟu Āḷamañci Uḷḷiṭṭa kuṭimai Eppeṟpaṭṭitum Oṉṟuṅ koḷḷakkaṭavo mallātomāka Ipparicu cantirātittavaṟ ce k kuṭuttom Ittiruveṇṇainallūr
sabhaiyom . Itu panmāheśvara rakṣai .
Digital edition of SII 7.944 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Dorotea Operato.
